subject: Career
title: Building Social Capital as an Introvert
description: A 60-second lesson on Building Social Capital as an Introvert.

hook.text: He dreaded networking events. But he built one of the strongest networks in his industry â€” quietly.

buildup.text: Networking isn't just cocktail parties. Deep one-on-one conversations are an introvert's superpower.

discovery.text: Susan Cain's research: introverts excel at listening, asking thoughtful questions, and building deep trust.

twist.text: Extroverts collect contacts. Introverts build relationships. Quality beats quantity every time.

climax.text: Leverage introvert strengths: coffee chats over conferences, written follow-ups over small talk.

punchline.text: Networking isn't about being loud. It's about being memorable.

quiz.question: What networking advantage do introverts have?
options: They excel at deep listening and building trust through quality connections
